comprehensive_overview: Cartopy is a Python package designed for geospatial data processing to produce high-quality visualizations of maps using matplotlib. It aims to simplify and enhance the mapping capabilities in Python, providing rich, interactive, and customized maps for various scientific disciplines.
core_features: Supports various map projections and coordinate reference systems
Integration with matplotlib for plotting spatial data
Ability to plot data on maps, add coastlines, borders, and gridlines
Provides tools for geospatial data manipulation and analysis
